name: MedArc
summary:
MedArc is an immersive Space-Based 2D Hospital Simulation game that puts players in the role of both designer and manager of a cutting-edge interstellar medical facility. This unique and captivating game allows you to take on the challenge of not just creating but also maintaining a hospital in the vastness of space.

In MedArc, you'll embark on an intergalactic journey, where your creative skills are put to the test as you design and construct a state-of-the-art hospital facility.
